text.div:
Coccidioidomycosis (Tests for Coccidioides species IgM Antibody)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    13948-5 Coccidioides immitis IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum by Immunoassay
    16639-7 Coccidioides immitis IgM Ab [Units/volume] in Cerebral spinal fluid
    22210-9 Coccidioides immitis IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum
    30208-3 Coccidioides immitis IgM Ab [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid
    33510-9 Coccidioides immitis IgM Ab [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Immunoassay
    33534-9 Coccidioides immitis IgM Ab [Presence] in Unspecified specimen
    43850-7 Coccidioides sp IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum by Immunoassay
    46183-0 Coccidioides sp IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum
    48393-3 Coccidioides immitis IgM Ab [Units/volume] in Body fluid
    51477-8 Coccidioides sp IgM Ab [Presence] in Unspecified specimen by Immune diffusion (ID)
    53367-9 Coccidioides sp IgM Ab [Presence] in Unspecified specimen
    62457-7 Coccidioides sp TP Ab [Presence] in Serum by Immune diffusion (ID)
    62458-5 Coccidioides immitis IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum by Immune diffusion (ID)
    75710-4 Coccidioides immitis+posadasii IgM Ab [Presence] in Cerebral spinal fluid by Immune diffusion (ID)
    7827-9 Coccidioides immitis IgM Ab [Units/volume] in Serum
    90448-2 Coccidioides sp IgM Ab [Units/volume] in Serum or Plasma
